about_the_game:
Do you want to complete On my Own getting the easier ways, learning how to defeat all monsters/bosses, and unlocking the whole content of the game?



This DLC contains a pdf document FULL OF SPOILERS about On my Own.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\On my Own: A Hot Isekai Adventurer\On My Own Walkthrough v1.0.0.pdf

content_descriptors.notes: Contains strong language and is about sexual themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Do you want to complete On my Own getting the easier ways, learning how to defeat all monsters/bosses, and unlocking the whole content of the game? Get a PDF document FULL OF SPOILERS about On my Own right now and unlock all achievements!
